item.title: Security on the Cloud: Myths and Realities!
item.dc:creator: The techReview
item.description: As we see the rapid adoption of cloud computing technology these days, subsequently some amount of exaggeration, myths and misconceptions also follow that. Cloud computing is one such technology where everyone has his or her share of opinion and analysis. But when you’re deploying the cloud infrastructure for your business or organization, you must be […]

item.description: How would you like to execute all your tasks which are supposed to be done every day? item.title: Cloud Expo Europe 2019
item.dc:creator: The techReview
item.description: Cloud Expo Europe is the UK’s leading event for connecting technologists, business leaders and senior business managers with experts, solutions and services to help accelerate digital transformation plans. The two-day trade show this year began on March 12 and is being held at ExCeL London. The trade show has gathered more than 600 cutting-edge exhibitors & […]

item.title: Indiasoft – 2019

item.description: The 19th edition of the two-day Indiasoft – 2019 – International exhibition and conferences, the flagship IT event of Electronics and Computer Software Export Promotion Council (ESC) began from today at HICC, Hyderabad, Telangana. item.title: India Mobile Congress (IMC) 2018
item.dc:creator: The techReview
item.description: The second edition of the India Mobile Congress (IMC 2018) with its theme “New Digital Horizons Connect, Create, Innovate” started at Aerocity, New Delhi on October 25, 2018, with large companies showcasing solutions for Smart City development, home and office automation, and IoT. 5G is the buzzword and everybody invariably seem to be using IoT […]

item.description: Whether you want to optimize your web pages to get a better search result or you want to redesign your website, monitoring the website traffic is always decisive. item.title: Choosing the Best Time Management and Information Organizer App to Boost Your Productivity
item.dc:creator: The techReview
item.description: Time is the most valuable resource you have. Tracking how you spend your time, both work and personal, can improve your productivity as it allows for accountability, helping you to find out which activities or events consumed most of your time. item.title: Google Tag Assistant – An Important Tool for Webmasters

item.description: Google has many tools which perhaps are not quite advertised. But then they are quite important in their purpose. item.title: Mobile Learning Apps for Cambridge English exams Launched
item.dc:creator: The techReview
item.description: Cambridge English Language Assessment (part of the University of Cambridge) through their exams partner, Concepts Edu has launched mobile/online learning apps for the TKT (Teaching Knowledge Test) and the Linguaskill exams on their Flinnt technology platform. TKT is a flexible series of modular teaching qualifications which test one’s knowledge in specific areas of English language […]
